response.overview: The rural bully, Uncle Yan, has one wife and five concubines, but he still has a weak wife. The Feng Shui master pointed out that farmer Chen Dashun's fields are prosperous with children and grandchildren, so Uncle Yan used both soft and hard tactics to seize Dashun's fields. Uncle Yan wanted to marry his sixth concubine, but when he learned that Dashun's daughter Guiying was pretty, he forced her to marry.
response.title: Spring Comes and Winter Goes
